about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for a fiery, bleak world, filled with lava flows, strange iridescent vegetation, and ancient ruins. Plus creatures that surely must have been Hell-spawned, like Imps, Fire Elementals, Spriggans, Shadow Demons, Bearded Devils, and the fearsome Balor.

Includes:
  • 30 new challenging monsters, including devils and demons, that will test you
  • Over 85 new weapons, shields and armor pieces
  • Over 30 new spells and abilities
  • New armors to protect you from the heat
  • Over 160 new and exotic loot items to discover

    All expansion packs (DLC) add an additional world that you can choose to travel to when you go through the Gate. These add more variety and challenge to the base game.

    NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.
